post.expressions.post.expressions: if ((chart.type in $L.file) isin {"line", "area"} and lng(denull($report.groupby.fields.key))>0 and index(chart.break.down.by in $L.file, $report.groupby.fields.key)<=0) then (chart.break.down.by in $L.file=1 in $report.groupby.fields.key;$report.groupby.field.type=3)
